Name: day_of_week
Description: last contact day of the week

Name: duration
Missing Values: in seconds (numeric). Important note:  this attribute highly affects the output target (e.g.
column8: the duration is not known before a call is performed. Also
column9: after the end of the call y is obviously known. Thus
column10: this input should only be included for benchmark purposes and should be discarded if the intention is to have a realistic predictive model.

Name: campaign
Description: number of contacts performed during this campaign and for this client (numeric

Name: pdays
Description: number of days that passed by after the client was last contacted from a previous campaign (numeric; -1 means client was not previously contacted)

Name: previous
Description: number of contacts performed before this campaign and for this client

Name: poutcome
Description: outcome of the previous marketing campaign (categorical: 'failure'

Name: y
Description: has the client subscribed a term deposit?
